# gsm.app: Shiny applications for `gsm` assessments

<!-- badges: start -->
::: {.pkgdown-release}
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/Gilead-BioStats/gsm.app/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/Gilead-BioStats/gsm.app/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml)
:::
::: {.pkgdown-devel}
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/Gilead-BioStats/gsm.app/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check-dev.yaml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/Gilead-BioStats/gsm.app/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check-dev.yaml)
:::
<!-- badges: end -->

gsm.app produces Shiny applications with drill-down functionality for [{gsm}](https://github.com/Gilead-BioStats/gsm.core) Assessments.

::: {.pkgdown-release}
You can explore a sample app produced by the latest release of gsm.app [here](https://openrbqm.shinyapps.io/gsm-app).
:::
::: {.pkgdown-devel}
You can explore a sample app produced by the development version of gsm.app [here](https://openrbqm.shinyapps.io/gsm-app-dev).
:::

## Installation

::: {.pkgdown-release}
You can install the latest release of gsm.app from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("Gilead-BioStats/gsm.app@*release‚Å†")
```
:::
::: {.pkgdown-devel}
You can install the development version of gsm.app from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("Gilead-BioStats/gsm.app")
```
:::
